data.text: a unique experience, very welcoming staff always available, very good food, room always super clean with surprises every day decorations on the bed an experience to try, I wanted to thank MOETASEM a spectacular guy if my room was full of surprises it was only thanks to him ❤️❤️
data.title: La mia bellissima esperienza al ParrotelAcquapark

data.text:
Stayed for 6 nights 2 adults 1 teen and a baby 16months, 

I will start with the pros 

Staff: Were really friendly, Mohammed at breakfast, lunch & dinners was amazing especially with my baby daughter, always got a hello from various staff members as well. 

Room cleaned every day and topped up with water bottles and tea/coffee. AirCon worked. 

Cons 

The hotel was being renovated and was more of a building site this was supposed to be completed before we arrived which was stated on our booking site, as a result the main restaurant was closed, and the 2 luxury pools with swim up bars were closed also. 

Breakfast, lunch dinner & bar snacks were limited, it felt basic and repetitive, I think this was due to the main restaurant  being closed. 

Every day we had to lug the babies push chair up to the smaller restaurant 2 flights of stairs, as there is no lifts anywhere. 

Aqua park area wave pull was never on, and some of the rides are switched off, babies pools were too cold left our 16 month old shivering!

pool bar & bars was our main disappointment, beer warm!! And wasn’t through a beer tap, it came out of a bottle in to a small plastic cup, any left over beer was left on the counter for the next person. 
No drinks fountains only option were sprite and Coco-Cola also out of a bottle and warm.
No cocktails either 

Entertainment wasn’t very entertaining barely anyone went to the shows. One night 1 of the animation team (male) wore a red wig and went around trying to kiss men.

Beach shared with 2 other Parrotel hotel  chains which were luxury, but unfortunately our hotel beach bar was low standard pretty much the same as the pool bars in a rickety shed!

Finally mosquitoes both me and my teen daughter were stung every where, it was uncomfortable I don’t normally have this problem going to hotels, around the world. We used spray but with limited effect, hotel probably needs to implement spraying bushes and get rid of stagnant water to help that. 

Conclusion 

This was my first ever review of a hotel, I don’t tend to leave reviews but I will make this an exception. 

I have been to enough hotels to be able to write this review on an all inclusive basis. So I believe it’s an honest review, I had also done my research on the hotel using trip advisor, and believed it was a good hotel although being a 4 star the reality was more like a 3 star, I hope this was just a one off and I don’t know if this was the time of the year, but however contributed to a-bit of stress & boredom 

I had also asked to swap hotel to the one over the road Parrotel beach resort as it was beautiful passing through, but I got no response from Parrotel head office. 

If you are on a budget and are just using it to stay while you explore I would say book, but if you wanted a rest by the pool this hotel wasn’t ideal for when we stayed. March 

.
data.title: Boring stay!!! Basic all inclusive

data.text: I came away in March 2024 for my Husbands 50th Birthday and found the Parrotel aqua Park resort hotel perfect. Not too busy as it was just before the Easter week. I found the staff to be very friendly. Boda was one of the best members of staff by far as he made us feel very welcome.
data.title: My experience of the staff and hotel

data.text: The hotel is truly wonderful, from the reception staff to the restaurant and housekeeping staff. Every person in the hotel deserves appreciation and respect, and the animation team in particular has full love for them. They add fun and love to the place. Thank you to everyone.I have to cooperate and the children’s parties are really beautiful. The children are very happy and the parties they have are fun.. It will not be the last time and we will come again soon.❤️❤️❤️❤️
data.title: Nice trip in parrotel aqua Park hotel ❤️❤️

data.text: Hotel undergoing major upgrades which made so many children’s facilities unavailable. We had heard a rumour that this was happening but Love Holidays, whose customer support was diabolical, assured us that everything was ok. The staff were excellent and the resort will be excellent when it is finished. Love Holidays were very poor and I will think twice about using them again. They messed up my payments and refused to take responsibility. One advisor said ‘never mind it’s not your last payment is it!’ Hotel will be great when finished but I won’t rush to use Love Holidays again.
data.title: Hotel facilities undergoing large amount of refurbishment making several advertised facilities unavailable.Staff great.
